full_summary:
**File ID:** EF236-240486

**Government Tender Announcement:**
**Title (French): **EF236-240486 - DDP (Demande de propositions) pour la remise en état du système de traitement des eaux usées###  
**Title (English):** EF236-240486 - RFP (Request for Proposal) for the Reinstatement of the Intermittent Recirculating Sand Filter System

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number (French):** WS4186786582-Doc4187261830
* **Amendment Number (French):** 3
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-10T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time [EDT])
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-02-09
* **Notice Type (English):** Request for Proposal
* **Notice Type (French):** Demande de propositions

**Project Overview**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has launched an open bidding process, seeking to reinstate the intermittent recirculating sand filter system at La Macaza Institution in La Macaza, Quebec, Canada.

**Overview of Reinstatement Project:**

PWGSC will be responsible for the repair and rehabilitation of the sewage treatment system. 

**Required Documentation and Submission**

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be conducted through Ariba and must be submitted by 14:00 HAE (Eastern Hourly Average) on 2023-10-10.

**Selection Criteria**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is open to Canadian businesses participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) program.

**Contactor Details:**

For inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact Pierre-Luc Dube at pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17398911?extsite=MTczOTg5MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
